**Project Charter: HR Insights Dashboard**

**1. Project Title:** HR Insights Dashboard

**2. Project Manager:** [Insert Project Manager Name and Contact Information]

**3. Project Sponsor:** [Insert Sponsor Name and Title, including contact information and authority level – e.g., VP of HR, with authority to approve budget and resource allocation]

**4. Date:** October 26, 2023

**5. Project Purpose and Business Justification:** This project aims to develop an HR Insights Dashboard providing a centralized, comprehensive view of critical HR metrics and assessments. This will empower HR leaders to make data-driven decisions, improve strategic planning, enhance employee experience, and ultimately contribute to improved organizational performance.  The justification lies in the need for improved HR decision-making based on objective data, leading to better resource allocation, increased employee engagement, and a stronger talent pipeline.

**6. Measurable Project Objectives:**

* Successfully launch the HR Insights Dashboard by [Date – e.g., December 31, 2023].
* Achieve a user satisfaction rating of at least 4.5 out of 5 stars based on feedback from 80% of target users within one month of launch.
* Reduce time spent on manual HR reporting by 50% within three months of launch.
* Improve the accuracy of HR data reporting by 95% compared to existing methods.

**7. High-Level Requirements:**

* The dashboard must be accessible via web browser on desktop and mobile devices.
* Data visualization must be clear, concise, and easy to understand.
* The dashboard must integrate with existing HR systems (specify systems).
* Data security and privacy must comply with all relevant regulations (specify regulations).
* The system must be user-friendly and require minimal training.
* The dashboard must include the following tabs: HR AI Agent Maturity Assessment, Top HR Trends for 2025, Succession Planning Dashboard, Employee Experience Dashboard, and Employee Value Proposition Assessment.


**8. High-Level Project Description and Product Characteristics:**

The HR Insights Dashboard will be a web-based application providing interactive visualizations of key HR data.  It will consolidate information from various sources into a single, easily accessible platform.  The product will be user-friendly, secure, and scalable to accommodate future growth.  The design will prioritize data clarity and actionable insights for HR leaders.

**9. High-Level Assumptions and Constraints:**

* **Assumptions:**  Existing HR systems will provide reliable and timely data.  Necessary resources (personnel, budget, technology) will be available as planned.  Stakeholders will actively participate in requirements gathering and testing.
* **Constraints:**  Project budget is capped at [Dollar Amount].  Project timeline is constrained by the [Date – e.g., year-end reporting deadline].  Availability of key personnel may be limited during peak periods.

**10. Project Approval Requirements:**

This Project Charter requires approval from the Project Sponsor ([Sponsor Name]) and signature below.

**11. Key Stakeholders:**

* [List key stakeholders with roles and responsibilities – e.g., VP of HR, HR Directors, IT Department, Data Analysts, End-users]

**12. Risks and Mitigation Strategies:**

| Risk                               | Probability | Impact      | Mitigation Strategy                                      |
|------------------------------------|-------------|-------------|----------------------------------------------------------|
| Data integration issues             | Medium       | High        | Thorough data mapping and integration testing upfront.    |
| Lack of stakeholder engagement      | Medium       | Medium      | Regular stakeholder communication and feedback sessions.   |
| Delays in data acquisition          | Low          | Medium      | Establish clear data delivery timelines with data owners. |
| Insufficient resources             | Low          | High        | Proactively identify and address resource gaps early.     |
| Security breach                     | Low          | Very High   | Implement robust security measures throughout the process. |
